TopicTitle: Kerbal International Docking Station - KIDS (Erkle docking mod + Deep Space Mission)

Articles.Content:
This is my first space station in orbit of Kerbin. Station is circulating in 200 AP & PE km orbit. I payloaded this with KW Rocketry Pack and MechJeb. This is first stage without any docked ships etc. This station is my first step to interplanetary space travels. If station will be growth i will post some new screenshoots.

Screenshoots : http://imgur.com/a/Zbgl0#0

Mods :

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/20503-0-16-Erkle-Mods-Warp-Capable-Docking-Clamp

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/7790-0-16-Parts-Pack-Deep-Space-Mission-Pack-(0-15-released)-Now-with-vanilla-size!

Sorry for my english, it's not my national language .
